text: Marashiyan or Marashis (in Mazandarani language: مرعشیون) is one of the Arab dynasties in Iran. Marashiyan ruled from 1359 to 1582 in Tabarestan (northern Iran). This is Islamic government. Mirbozorg is founder of the Marashiyans. == References == * Marʿas̲h̲is == Other websites == Category:Mazandaran Category:Arab world Category:Royal dynasties
title: Marashiyan
